name: Mortefi
quote: Fine, since you've done this much for me... Go ahead, tell me the wildest inventions you can think of, and watch me make them happen for you.
description:
Mortefi, a skilled expert in Applied Tacetite Study and a member of the Academy’s Department of Safety, possesses the unique ability to transform his accumulated frustration into fiery flames.
From a burning wrath that consumes all, the red dragon shall descend.

impromptu-show.name: Impromptu Show
impromptu-show.description: Basic Attack Mortefi uses his dual pistols and flames to perform up to 4 consecutive shots, dealing Fusion DMG. Heavy Attack Mortefi enters the aiming state for a more powerful shot. The aimed shot fired after charging finishes deals Fusion DMG. Mid-air Attack Mortefi consumes Stamina to perform consecutive shots at the target in mid-air, dealing Fusion DMG. Dodge Counter Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG.

passionate-variation.name: Passionate Variation
passionate-variation.description: Launch a flashing lightning of flames forward, dealing Fusion DMG.

violent-finale.name: Violent Finale
violent-finale.description: Deal Fusion DMG, and apply Burning Rhapsody to all characters in the team. Burning Rhapsody When the on-field character's Basic Attack hits the target, Mortefi launches a Coordinated Attack, firing 1 Marcato. When the on-field character's Heavy Attack hits the target, Mortefi launches a Coordinated Attack, firing 2 Marcato. Mortefi can launch one Coordinated Attack every 0.35s. Marcato Deals Fusion DMG.

harmonic-control.name: Harmonic Control
harmonic-control.description: After casting Resonance Skill Passionate Variation, the damage of Resonance Skill Fury Fugue is increased by 25% for 8s.

rhythmic-vibrato.name: Rhythmic Vibrato
rhythmic-vibrato.description: During Resonance Liberation Burning Rhapsody, each hit of Resonance Liberation Marcato will increase the damage of the next Resonance Liberation Marcato by 1.5%, which can be triggered once every 0.35s, stacking up to 50 times. The effect will be reset after Resonance Liberation Burning Rhapsody ends.

dissonance.name: Dissonance
dissonance.description: Attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG.

fury-fugue.name: Fury Fugue
fury-fugue.description: Resonance Skill: Fury Fugue When Mortefi's "Annoyance" reaches 100, his Resonance Skill is replaced with Fury Fudge. When casting Fury Fudge, Mortefi consumes all "Annoyance" to unleash high-speed flame lightning, dealing Fusion DMG, considered as Resonance Skill damage. Annoyance Mortefi can hold up to 100 Annoyance. When Normal Attack Impromptu Show hits the target, “Annoyance” is restored. When Intro Skill Dissonance hits the target, “Annoyance” is restored. When Resonance Skill Passionate Variation hits the target, “Annoyance” is restored. Within 5s after casting Passionate Variation, Basic Attack Impromptu that hits the target additionally restores “Annoyance”.

skillful-cooking.name: Skillful Cooking
skillful-cooking.description: Has a chance to produce special dishes when cooking
